title: Autoimmune Diseases and Immune Modulation: Current Research and Future Outlook.
abstract: Autoimmune diseases (ADs), such as rheumatoid arthritis (RA), Sjogren's disease (SS), and Systemic Lupus Erythematosus (SLE), have a significant impact on patients' quality of life and impose significant economic and psychological burdens on society and families [...].
